likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the Net Zero 2050 scenario, while consumer preferences may slightly shift towards sustainability, the overall demand for iOS and related software may increase due to a heightened focus on integrating sustainability features, thus slightly increasing the impact.

emerging_opportunities.description: Development of iOS features that promote sustainability, such as energy-efficient settings and carbon footprint tracking.
Collaborating with other technology firms focused on sustainability to enhance the iPhone's software ecosystem.

additional_challenges.description: Increased regulations around software sustainability and data privacy could complicate iPhone software development.
The need to adapt software to work with sustainable hardware components may create compatibility issues.

mitigation_strategies.strategy: Invest in R&D for Sustainable Technologies
mitigation_strategies.description: Allocate resources to research and develop sustainable software solutions that align with consumer expectations.
Create educational content within iOS that informs users about sustainability features and practices.
Partner with NGOs and environmental organizations to promote sustainable practices within the iOS ecosystem.
